channel.title: ISAT Script RSS Feed
channel.description: Keep up to date with the In Stars And Time Script Project!

item.title: Last rooms
item.description: Text for the rooms after defeating the King, unrelated to talking to the characters.

item.title: Loop Hangout
item.description: Text relating to Loop's hang out in ACT 3 / 4.

item.title: Death Corridor
item.description: Text relating to the Death Corridor, including the ACT 1 ending.

item.description: Text relating the True ending of START AGAIN: a prologue.

item.description: Text relating the "perfect" ending of START AGAIN: a prologue.

item.description: Text relating to starting over after death in START AGAIN: a prologue.

item.title: King Fight (START AGAIN)
item.description: Text relating to the King fight in START AGAIN: a prologue.

item.title: Isaquest
item.description: Everything relating to Isabeau's Friendquest.

item.title: Last Room / Snackbreak
item.description: The last room / snack break in START AGAIN.

item.title: Candy Scene / Last Hallway
item.description: The candy scene that is part of START AGAIN's true ending.

item.title: Isabeau Beginning Talk
item.description: Talking to Isabeau in Dormont, both at the Favor Tree and elsewhere.

item.title: Loop Conversation Basics
item.description: The general outline of conversations with Loop.

item.title: Favor Tree
item.description: Text for the Favor Tree, primarily story events.

item.title: Dormont Center
item.description: Text for central Dormont. Excludes Tutorial Kid and the Change God statue, which will receive their own pages.

item.title: Euphrasie Ending Talk
item.description: Euphrasie's dialogue at the end. Includes talking to her first, last, Friendquest variants, and the ACT 4 ending.

item.title: Ghost Event update
item.description: Reformatted + added associated Loop talks!

item.title: Ghost Event update
item.description: Reformatted + added associated Loop talks!

item.description: Text for the Silver Coin.

item.description: Text for northern Dormont.

item.description: Text for northern Dormont.

item.title: Odile End Talk
item.description: Odile's dialogue in the last room.

item.title: Sus Event
item.description: The Event in the Last Room, if you act suspicious enough.

item.title: Deaths
item.description: Text relating to dying and what comes after.

item.title: Miraquest
item.description: Mirabelle's Friendquest, including all variations and actions leading up to it.

item.title: Mirabelle's Dorm Room
item.description: All text for Mirabelle's dorm room on floor 3.

item.title: Mirabelle Beginning Talk
item.description: Dialogue with Mirabelle in Dormont, both from entering town and talking to her on the bench.

item.title: Game files to wiki Portrait names
item.description: Since the game files and the portraits on the wiki are differently named, here's a conversion list for all of them, just in case.

item.title: Confession and Bad Touch
item.description: Everything relating to Isabeau's disastrous love life. Includes both the confession attempts in the final room, as well as the shoulder touches and associated event at the Favor Tree.

item.title: Isabeau End Talk
item.description: Dialogue for Isabeau inside the final room. Includes the "confession".

item.title: ACT 3 Intro
item.description: A small compilation of the ACT 3 Intro, including scenes in the meadow, talking to Mirabelle, and meeting up with Loop.

item.title: Meadow
item.description: All text associated with the meadow, including all ACT intros and nap taking.

item.title: Odilequest
item.description: Everything about Odile's Friendquest. Includes all preparations for it, like scouring libraries, talking to the Boulanger, arguing with children, and everything Loop has to say on the subject. And the main scene itself, of course.

item.title: About page
item.description: In order to cut down on sidebar space on every page, I now have an About page to be verbose about site formatting practicies.

item.title: Testing, testing!
item.description: Hello hello? Does this thing work?
